name: Fall from Grace (Langosh)
description:
A 2D platformer with puzzles and multiple endings based on the player's decisions and situated in the Underworld where Wrath, Envy, Sloth, and Lust try to stop our hero from bringing his wife back to life.

This is our first game ever, a university project we worked on for one semester (2021/2022). 

CONTROLS: ABILITIES:
  • E push/pull big cube, pick up/put down small cube 
  • Q sleep (only in Sloth’s level 3 ) 
  • LMB teleport (not in Wrath’s level 1)

We have provided a user manual in the downloadable files in case you feel lost during the playthrough. There is a "spoiler" section providing info on how to overcome some obstacles.

CREDITS: Tereza Langová (Langosh)
  • UI design
  • Level design
  • Graphic design: Levels 1 and 3 (lava and sleepy land)
  • Character design: Envy, Lust, Pride, Greed
  • Animations
  • Cutscenes
  • Dubbing: Lust, Envy
Filip Barva (Barevnej)
  • Programming
  • Shaders
  • Particle effects
  • Dubbing: Wrath
  • Audio implementation
Zuzana Slaninová 
  • Graphic design: Levels 2 and 4 (crystals and pink lace land)
  • Character design: Gluttony, Wrath
Michal Vonášek
  • Camera
  • Player controls
  • UI programming
  • Dubbing: Sloth
